subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: A surprising loss to Canada has put the Americans’ Olympic hopes in jeopardy. They now face a must-win game against El Salvador, likely followed by a matchup with rival Mexico.
snippet: A surprising loss to Canada has put the Americans’ Olympic hopes in jeopardy. They now face a must-win game against El Salvador, likely followed by a matchup with rival Mexico.
